name: Error Customization
title: Error Customization
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1077740513 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

See Okta Errors for detailed information about errors.

Error page customization especially takes place in case of errors that occur on Okta side that will not redirect back to the respective installation. The customized error page will have a Questback style only shows a very generic error mesage.

The error customization takes place in a Bitbucket repository:

https://bitbucket.org/qbengineering/okta_resource_login_customization/src/master/

Also see:

https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-error-pages/overview/
